description: This is your app in English.

hero.title: Owens Bot
hero.description: A Discord bot for creating pools and rating matches.

pool.title: Pool
pool.description: Create and manage betting pools easily with Owens. Here are some key commands to handle your pools and events on your Discord server:

commands.createpool: !createpool <name>: Creates a new betting pool for the server.
commands.match: !match <pool> <fight>: Posts a match for users to bet on using emojis.
commands.result: !result <messageID> <emoji>: Sets the winning emoji for the match.
commands.finish: !finish <pool>: Finishes the betting pool, assigns points, and shows event rankings.
commands.ranking: !ranking: Shows the global ranking for the current server.

ranking.title: Ranking
ranking.description: Keep track of the competition with Owens' ranking system. Use the !ranking command to view the global standings in your server and see who's leading the game.

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: Let users rate matches easily with Owens. Use the !rate command to create polls where your community can score matches from 1 to 5 stars, and !viewrating to see average ratings and votes.

features.engagement: Engages users by allowing them to rate matches interactively
features.ratings: Shows average ratings to identify fan favorites
features.feedback: Improves event feedback and community participation

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Support the continuous development of Owens! Use the !donate command to see donation options or click the button below to contribute directly via Ko-fi.

footer.copyright: Â© 2025 Owens Bot. All rights reserved.
